appDesc.message: Send media stream links from current tab to MPlayer media player

msgCopy.message: Number of links copied to the clipboard:

msgNoCopy.message: Cannot copy to the clipboard on this page!

msgNotFound.message: The external media player is not found. Please make sure the path in the options page is correct

msgCommunicationRejected.message: To allow other extensions to send media links to the external music player, set a passphrase in the options page and share it with those extensions

optionsTitle.message: Options :: Send to MPlayer media player

optionsCMDDesc.message: OS level command to open MPlayer media player

optionsPassphraseDesc.message: If you would like to allow another extension to send commands to the external player using this extension, please assign a passphrase for the communication

optionsError.message: Open "One Last Step" page when the exit code is not equal to the successful code (recommended)

optionsBadge.message: Display a badge number when a new audio or video source is detected for this tab
